  Fetches a single n8n project by ID or name. Since the n8n API doesn't provide a GET /projects/{id} endpoint, this datasource uses the LIST endpoint with client-side filtering.
---

# n8n_project (Data Source)

Fetches a single n8n project by ID or name. Since the n8n API doesn't provide a GET /projects/{id} endpoint, this datasource uses the LIST endpoint with
client-side filtering.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Project identifier. Either `id` or `name` must be specified.
- `name` (String) Project name. Either `id` or `name` must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the project was created
- `description` (String) Project description
- `icon` (String) Project icon
- `type` (String) Project type (e.g., 'team', 'personal')
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the project was last updated
